titles: The description and use of two arithmetick instruments together with a short treatise, explaining and demonstrating the ordinary operations of arithmetick, as likewise a perpetual almanack and several useful tables : presented to His most excellent Majesty Charles II ... / by S. Morland.
author: Morland, Samuel, Sir, 1625-1695.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
